A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Garbage. Terrible plot devices that are slow to play out and have no pay-off. Rian Johnson appears never to have seen a Star Wars movie\, as he has no idea what to do with the OT characters (or even the new characters). Numerous plot holes...Literally a 2.5 hour movie where nothing happens. What a shame to not capitalize on what TFA promised. I can't even see how JJ can save this trilogy in EP IX.
